00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "AWSizeB1.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 std::string AWSizeB1::get_name() const
00043   { return "AWSizeB1"; }
00044 
00045 AWSizeB1::~AWSizeB1() {}
00046 
00047 bool AWSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A, 
00048                          const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W, 
00049                          double& result, 
00050                          MsqError& err )
00051 {
00052   const double alpha = det(A);
00053   const double omega = det(W);
00054   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00055   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00056   {
00057     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg_aw, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00058     return false;
00059   }
00060   
00061   result = (alpha - omega);
00062   result *= result;
00063   result /= prod;
00064   return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool AWSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A,
00068                                    const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W,
00069                                    double& result,
00070                                    MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_A,
00071                                    MsqError& err )
00072 {
00073   const double alpha = det(A);
00074   const double omega = det(W);
00075   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00076   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00077   {
00078     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg_aw, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00079     return false;
00080   }
00081 
00082   result = (alpha - omega);
00083   result *= result;
00084   result /= prod;
00085   deriv_wrt_A = transpose_adj(A);
00086   deriv_wrt_A *= (alpha*alpha - omega*omega)/(alpha*prod);
00087   return true;
00088 }
00089 
00090 bool AWSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A, 
00091                          const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W, 
00092                          double& result, 
00093                          MsqError& err )
00094 {
00095   const double alpha = det(A);
00096   const double omega = det(W);
00097   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00098   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00099   {
00100     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg_aw, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00101     return false;
00102   };
00103   
00104   result = (alpha - omega);
00105   result *= result;
00106   result /= prod;
00107   return true;
00108 }
00109 
00110 bool AWSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A,
00111                                    const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W,
00112                                    double& result,
00113                                    MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_A,
00114                                    MsqError& err )
00115 {
00116   const double alpha = det(A);
00117   const double omega = det(W);
00118   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00119   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00120   {
00121     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg_aw, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00122     return false;
00123   }
00124 
00125   result = (alpha - omega);
00126   result *= result;
00127   result /= prod;
00128   deriv_wrt_A = transpose_adj(A);
00129   deriv_wrt_A *= (alpha*alpha - omega*omega)/(alpha*prod);
00130   return true;
00131 }
